name: i18next-fs-backend
description: i18next-fs-backend is a backend layer for i18next using in Node.js and for Deno to load translations from the filesystem.

scripts.copy: rm -rf lib/formats && mkdir lib/formats && npm run copy:json5 && npm run copy:yaml
scripts.compile: npm run copy && rm -rf cjs && mkdir cjs && babel lib -d cjs --presets=@babel/preset-env --plugins=add-module-exports && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > cjs/package.json && cp lib/fs.cjs cjs/fs.js && node -e "fs.writeFileSync('cjs/readFile.js', fs.readFileSync('cjs/readFile.js').toString().replace('fs.cjs', 'fs.js'))" && node -e "fs.writeFileSync('cjs/writeFile.js', fs.readFileSync('cjs/writeFile.js').toString().replace('fs.cjs', 'fs.js'))"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && mocha test -R spec --exit --experimental-modules
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build && git push
